name: Simply Lunar Lander
description:
A classic game remade by me!
Test your precision and fuel efficiency with this fun little simulator game!
If you've played Lunar Lander before. You should know what to do.
If not, here's a summary.
To win, Keep your velocity below 4, keep your lander pointing straight up and land on a score platform. If you fail to do any of these, well... ...Let's just say you'll owe NASA big bucks.

Controls,
W: Activate Thruster
A: Rotate Left
D: Rotate Right
